channel.title: cod on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cod on Barefoot Rob

item.title: thunderrabbit.com
item.description: 13:35 Thursday 15 September 2016 JST Back before the World Wide Web popularized The Internet, we had BBS on Fidonet. The best BBS in my world was The Castle of Dreams. Some years ago, I made an homage to Castle of Dreams on thunderrabbit.com. That’s because I created the character Thunder Rabbit specifically to participate on The Castle of Dreams. Featuring https, the latest version of Mediawiki, and an “amazing” array of navigation routes, The Castle of Dreams is ready for exploration!

item.title: CastleParty
item.description: Sunday evening Dec 22, 1991 (transcribed from Book Two of my diary) The party was really cool. By chance I ended up exchanging gifts with Dream Keeper. I got a Lego set #6259, “Broadside’s Brig.” It’s a jail cell for pirates. Very cool. At the party, we played charades and Master Clue. One of my charade things was a bid for “Burke’s Law.” I got it for 45 seconds. I intended to say “rhymes with -” .
